name: Blood Scourge
desc: Conjure a swirling mass of chaotic energy that will drain the life out of your foes.

name: Chorus Divide
desc: Using your bell to channel your energy into a high pressure beam

name: Gravity Field
desc: Conjure a gravity field that cripples your foes.

name: Jar of Souls
desc: Consume the souls of your enemies and unleash them in devastating attacks.

name: Payback
desc: Pay back your enemies for the damage they deal to you.

name: Portals
desc: Dive into a portal and emerge from a different point a few seconds later.

name: Preservation
desc: Conjure a protective energy that will guide those fallen in battle towards you. The protective energy will stay the hands of death, preventing starvation, drowning and incineration.

name: Resurrection
desc: Bless targeted allies on the battlefied that revives them when defeated.

name: Run it Back
desc: Set down a marker in space and time, returning to it after a duration.

name: Sacred Field
desc: Conjure a field of sacred light. Protecting you and your allies from harm.

name: Shard Bow
desc: Conjure a mythical bow that hails down crystallized arrows.

name: Skeleton Key
desc: Summon skeletal barriers that trap opponents and launch them across the battlefield.

name: Smite
desc: Summon a halo of rotating orbs that will strike your foes automatically.

name: Smokescreen
desc: Create a smokescreen for a diversion!

name: Wind-Up
desc: Wind up your arm, storing successively more energy until you finally unleash it.

name: Dimensional Travel
desc: Slip into an alternate dimension that exists alongside our own.
